form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR CERTIFICATE OF CITIZENSHIP, Form N-600 ( (Rev. 9-1-69)

full_text: Form approved. FEE STAMP Budget Bureau No. 43-R0105. UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE APPLICATION FOR CERTIFICATE OF CITIZENSHIP Take or mail this application to: IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE Date (Print or type) HARRIET CAROL ALTMAN nee March 9,1972 HAFT Apt 1121 So AFLANTIC (Name) BLVD (Maiden name, if any) (Apartment number, Street address, and, if appropriate, "in care of ALIEN REGISTRATION /ALHAMRA CALIF 91803 (City) (County) (State) (ZIR Code) No. A19918776 2834043 (Telephone Number) See Instructions on Pages 5 and 6 I hereby apply to the Commissioner of Immigration and Naturalization for a certificate showing that I am a citizen of the United States of America. (1) I was born in WARSAK POLAND Were 29 on (City) (State or country) (Month) (Day) (Year) (2) My personal description is: Sex FEMALE,complexion FAIR color of eyes BLUE color of hair GREX: height 5 feet 4 inches; weight 119 pounds; visible distinctive marks NONE- Marital status: Married; Divorced; Widow(er). (3) I arrived in the United/States at under the name 3 HANNAH HAFTASZ. (City means of and State) SHIP Won Train (Month) (Day) (Year) (Name of ship or other means of arrival) on U.S. Passport No. issued to me at on ; (Month) (Day) (Year) on an Immigrant Visa. (4) FILL IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU ARRIVED IN THE UNITED STATES BEFORE JULY 1, 1924. (a) My last permanent foreign residence was (City) (Country) (b) I took the ship or other conveyance to the United States at (City) (Country) (c) I was coming to at (Name of person in the United States) (City and State where this person was living) (d) I traveled to the United States with (Names of passengers or relatives with whom you traveled, and their relationship to you, if any) (5) Have you been out of the United States since you first arrived? Yes No. If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence. NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED To RETURN TO THE RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES UNITED STATES (6) I horeart filed a declaration of intention to become a citizen of the United States or a petition for naturalization. (have) (have not) (If "have" give full details on a separate sheet of paper this size and attach it, showing question number.) TO THE APPLICANT.-Do not write between the double lines below. Continue on next page. ARRIVAL RECORDS EXAMINED ARRIVAL RECORD FOUND Card index Place Date Index books Name Manifests Manner Marital status Age ature of person making search) Form N-600 (Rev. 9-1-69) (1)
